CustomField.formula: ( IF( ISBLANK(TEXT(Primary_Competitor__c)), 0, 1 )+ IF( ISBLANK(TEXT(Project_Budgeted__c)), 0, 2 )+ IF( ISBLANK(TEXT(Urgency_Driver_for_Q4_2006__c)), 0, 2 )+ IF( ISBLANK(Project_Start_Date__c), 0, 1 )+ IF( ISBLANK(TEXT(Firm_Procurement_Team__c)), 0, 1 ))/10
CustomField.label: Completeness Score: Investigation
